errors.format: First name must start with a letter and only contain letters, apostrophes, hyphens, full stops or spaces
errors.length: First name must be 70 characters or less

errors.format: Last name must start with a letter and only contain letters, apostrophes, hyphens, full stops or spaces
errors.length: Last name must be 70 characters or less

errors.required: Enter a new first or last name
